title: R2AIR
author: R2AIR
created_time: May 12, 2023, 08:46:31 AMLast edit: May 12, 2023, 09:00:56 AM by R2AIR
content: The cornerstone of AI, a new beginning.Since OPENAI released GPT-3, the development of large models has seen explosive growth. However, expensive computing costs have slowed down the pace of AI progress. The use of GPUs also requires certain skills and experience, which is also a threshold for beginners. Therefore, we hope to establish a decentralized machine learning platform using R2D2AI, so that anyone can use their GPU computing power to train large-scale models and receive corresponding rewards. This will make machine learning more open and democratic, allowing more people to participate in the development of machine learning.The previous PoW algorithms mostly used GPUs or mining machines to calculate specific hash values, which not only wasted computing power but also huge waste of electricity. R2D2AI is implemented based on blockchain technology, but no longer uses computational power to calculate hash values, but instead uses computational power for training and reasoning of large models. In the R2D2AI network, GPUs that meet the requirements can become nodes and contribute their computing power to ensure the operation of the network. At the same time, users can rent out their GPU computing power to those who need to train models and reasoning, in order to receive corresponding rewards.Some Links:https://r2d2ai.orgWhitepaper:https://r2d2ai.org/r2air.pdftwitter:https://twitter.com/R2D2AIRobotemail:admin@r2d2ai.org
